headline: AST SpaceMobile, Inc. (ASTS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on AST SpaceMobile, Inc. on LongYield’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ASTS. AST SpaceMobile, Inc.’s share was trading at $56.20 as of November 28th. AST SpaceMobile, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs and develops the constellation of BlueBird satellites in the United States. ASTS is pursuing an ambitious plan to […]

headline: Verizon: Steady Growth, Reliable Dividends, And A Defensive Moat
summary: Verizon (VZ) remains a Buy, offering a 20% upside to a $49 price target, plus a 6.75% dividend yield.
